name: AdventureGold
description: Adventure Gold ERC-20 contract for the Loot project community. This contract is unaudited!

scripts.start: ganache-cli -f https://cloudflare-eth.com/ -m "apple apple apple apple apple apple apple apple apple apple apple apple" --secure --unlock "0xdd3767abcab26f261e2508a1da1914053c7dda78" --unlock "0xcD814C83198C15A542F9A13FAf84D518d1744ED1" -u 0 -u 1 -u 2 -u 3 -u 4 -u 5 -u 6 -u 7 -u 8 -u 9

author: Will Papper
